categories: Category:Battles of the invasion of the Tython system

nodes.text: When the Infinite Empire of the Rakata species invaded the Tython system in 25,793 BBY, their first strike was an attack on the space station Fury Station. Fury Station was an outpost of the star system's Settled Worlds in orbit over Furies Gate, the farthest planet in the system from the star Tythos. Fury Station was devastated during the assault, and following the attack, the Infinite Empire captured both of the gas giants in the system, Obri and Mawr, and their moons.
The attack on Fury Station was first mentioned in the comic book Dawn of the Jedi: Force War 1, a comic book written by John Ostrander and released on November 20, 2013.
